metadata.title: Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktop 7.x Delivery Controller

components.title: Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktop 7.x Delivery Controller
components.description: Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktop 7.x Delivery Controller based on DOD SRG/STIG.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement ac-4.

implemented-requirements.description: Citrix Delivery Controller must implement DoD-approved encryption.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement ac-17.2.

implemented-requirements.description: Citrix Delivery Controller must implement DoD-approved encryption.
Citrix Delivery Controller must implement DoD-approved encryption.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement cm-6.

implemented-requirements.description: Citrix Delivery Controller must be configured in accordance with the security configuration settings based on DoD security configuration or implementation guidance, including STIGs, NSA configuration guides, CTOs, and DTMs.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement cm-7.

implemented-requirements.description: Citrix Delivery Controller must implement DoD-approved encryption.
Citrix Delivery Controller must be configured to disable non-essential capabilities.
